Package Models.Data

Class Setting

java.lang.Object
Models.Data.Setting
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Setting extends Object implements Serializable
Stores the data for a Setting object.

    • getStandardPrice

      public double getStandardPrice(AgeClass ageClass)
      Get Standard Ticket Price by Age class
      Parameters:
      ageClass - user selected Age class
      Returns:
      Standard Price * age multiplier, rounded off to the nearest 50 cents
